amendment.purpose: An amendment to strike the words "conference report to accompany the" from the 8th paragraph.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Sessions amendment (A001) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A001) offered by Mr. Sessions.
